title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\CreateServiceRequest
name: CreateServiceRequest
description:
Request message for creating a Service.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.CreateServiceRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The location and project in which this service should be created. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}, where {project} can be project id or number. Only lowercase characters, digits, and hyphens.

params.name: data.service_id
params.description: Required. The unique identifier for the Service. It must begin with letter, and cannot end with hyphen; must contain fewer than 50 characters. The name of the service becomes {parent}/services/{service_id}.

params.name: data.validate_only
params.description: Indicates that the request should be validated and default values populated, without persisting the request or creating any resources.
